item.title: A Bosnian tale
item.description: As I may have mentioned, I am a huge fan of the Erasmus programme. It is just that I have so many amazing experiences that it drives me to search for more. Recently, I have been on a training in Banja Luka, Bosnia. It was my first time in Bosnia and I can easily say I would never forget it. I don’t know if it is Bosnian magic or just the rahat lokum, but that’s the reality!
